name: Wedding Guest Book Library Card Catalog Blackboard Library Guest Book Set
description:
Looking for an alternative to the traditional wedding guest book? This vintage library card catalog drawer is the perfect size to display at your wedding. Guest can use one of the cards to fill in their information and leave the couple a loving note. Makes addressing thank you cards very easy.

This unique library card catalog wedding guest book has 12 dividers, 200 address AND 200 blank inserts. I have included 200 blank inserts for personal use after the event. The box measures 16 3/4" long. 2" high, 5 3/4" wide. Plenty of room for personal use such as yearly calendar, recipes, addresses, lists, etc. The dividers measure 5x4 and the inserts are a bit smaller. The drawer is perfect for 3.5x5 cards if you decide to add more and use as a recipe box as well. All of the paper is hand cut. A 4x5 coordinating tented sign to provide direction for your guests is included.

This is a LIMITED EDITION as I only have 9 Library Card Catalog Drawers.

COLORS CAN be changed! The Library Card Catalog is available with any of the other designs from my shop. So if you prefer different dividers just purchase this listing and leave me a detailed note in your Message to Seller upon checkout.

LIBRARY CARD CATALOG COLLECTION http://www.cutthecakedesigns.com

~~~WHEN ORDERING~~~ 
Please let me know: 
- if you would prefer ALL 400 inserts be blank 
-names to be printed on the dividers 
-your Wedding Date 
-color preference (if you want to change it) 
IF you would like to change the design... indicate which number design you'd like and any info if design can be personalized. 
IN YOUR NOTE TO SELLER

~~~Custom Orders~~~ 
Custom orders are available for an additional fee. Please contact me for pricing before placing your order. 
I can design dividers to coordinate with your wedding colors, home decor, personality, etc.

~~~Shipping Time~~~ 
Due to the high demand...PLEASE check FAQ for current production time. Need it sooner just let me know I offer rush orders for an additional fee.

Cut the Cake Designs wedding guest book boxes have been featured in Brides Magazine, The Knot, and on several wedding blogs.
